Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2901 ENTERPRISE LANE MIDLAND INTL. AIR & SPACE PORT, MIDLAND, Texas, 79706, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: AST SpaceMobile Inc is a satellite designer and manufacturer. The company is building the global cellular broadband network in space to operate directly with standard, unmodified mobile devices based on extensive IP and patent portfolio. AST is on a mission to eliminate the connectivity gaps faced by mobile subscribers and finally bring broadband to the billions who remain unconnected.
